caption: 💡 Looking to level up your professional game? Check out our latest video for essential tips that’ll help you stand out in the workplace! Whether it's mastering communication or boosting productivity, we've got you covered. 🚀✨ Tag a friend who needs to see this and let’s grow together! 👥💼 #CareerTips #ProfessionalGrowth

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

media_prompt: A tips social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 💡 Looking to level up your professional game? Check out our latest video for essential tips that’ll , high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
